name: icons
title: Icons
description: A collection of icons from Lucide React

files.content:
import { Icons } from "@/components/ui/icons";

export const icons = {
  name: "icons",
  type: "ui",
  description:
    "FontAwesome icon components demonstrating SSR compatibility and various icon styles. Includes comprehensive icon library for v0 compatibility.",
  components: {
    default: <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="home" />,
    "xs-solid": <Icons size="xs" style="solid" icon="home" />,
    "sm-solid": <Icons size="sm" style="solid" icon="home" />,
    "md-solid": <Icons size="md" style="solid" icon="home" />,
    "lg-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="home" />,
    "xs-regular": <Icons size="xs" style="regular" icon="home" />,
    "sm-regular": <Icons size="sm" style="regular" icon="home" />,
    "md-regular": <Icons size="md" style="regular" icon="home" />,
    "lg-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="home" />,

    // Common icons showcase
    "user-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="user" />,
    "cog-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="cog" />,
    "search-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="search" />,
    "plus-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="plus" />,
    "edit-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="edit" />,
    "trash-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="trash" />,
    "save-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="save" />,
    "download-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="download" />,
    "upload-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="upload" />,
    "check-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="check" />,
    "times-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="times" />,
    "info-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="info" />,
    "warning-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="warning" />,
    "database-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="database" />,
    "table-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="table" />,
    "chartLine-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="chartLine" />,
    "bell-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="bell" />,
    "creditCard-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="creditCard" />,
    "folder-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="folder" />,
    "comment-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="comment" />,
    "clock-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="clock" />,
    "ellipsis-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="ellipsis" />,
    "rightFromBracket-solid": (
      <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="rightFromBracket" />
    ),
    "chevronLeft-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="chevronLeft" />,
    "chevronRight-solid": <Icons size="lg" style="solid" icon="chevronRight" />,

    // Regular style icons
    "user-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="user" />,
    "bell-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="bell" />,
    "creditCard-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="creditCard" />,
    "folder-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="folder" />,
    "comment-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="comment" />,
    "clock-regular": <Icons size="lg" style="regular" icon="clock" />,
  },
};
